blog.name: angelofberlin2000
blog.title: Like a Rose trampled on the ground
blog.description:
In addition to the pain and the exhaustion, he recalled how waiting on the cross between takes became tedious. To fight the boredom, he listened to music on headphones. One particular song called "Above All" (Like a Rose ...) by Michael W. Smith helped him through his most difficult moments.

"It arrived when I was confused and angry. I didn't think I could go on. The song described how Jesus was rejected and alone. That thought took me to a place — it opened an interior door that held me while on the cross," an emotional Caviezel explained. "The experience of feeling rejected and alone as all those around me laughed while drinking their hot coffees, oblivious to what was occurring. Jesus must have felt like this — forsaken, rejected, alone, and despised. It helped me pray in a very deep way — to pray without words, to pray from the heart. The discomfort, the loneliness, the split shoulder, the raw flesh all forced me into the arms of God because I had nowhere else to go for a performance I knew I was unable to create."
Jim Caviezel, Shamelessly Catholic

body:
Retired (John Wick Imagine)

Summary: John is ready to officially leave the business.

You were sat on the couch with John’s dog laid out at the end of your feet. You were reading a book, but you could barely keep your attention on it. John had left hours ago on a job that he was called in for, which would be okay if your boyfriend’s job wasn’t so dangerous.

John was a hitman. The best hitman actually. He was known to everyone in his business as the Baba Yaga, the boogeyman.

You didn’t know all of this until you had been dating for about six months. He came clean with you because he thought you deserved that. He could tell that you two were getting serious and he wanted to lay it all out for you before you continued on. He expected you to leave him, but was surprised when you didn’t. You were freaked out of course. How could this man with a gentle heart be in a profession that’s so violent? You had fallen hard for John, however, so you didn’t let his job occupation deter you. He’d promised you that he was going to get out soon because he was ready to lead a normal life with you.

A year eventually went by and John asked you to move in with him, which you did. Everything was great. You and John were so domestic, but John still wasn’t out of the game fully. He told you he was trying to get out, but he had a few more business deals to take care of. You didn’t ask much about it. It was an unspoken rule that you didn’t ask questions and he wouldn’t tell you about it.

You finally put the book down and rubbed your eyes after reading the same sentence several times. You couldn’t concentrate when John was out there doing who knew what. You didn’t know if he was safe or anything. You just had to wait.

Finally, you heard the front door open. John’s dog, who yet had a name, raised up from his spot and immediately went running to the door. You stood and followed him, gasping at what you found. John was stood there in his well tailored suit, but he was looking worse for wear. Blood stained the white dress shirt he was wearing along with various spots of his suit jacket. His face also had some blood on it and you could see some spots already swelling. His hair was disheveled and he was bent over the staircase. You’d never seen him so beat up before.

“John,” you spoke in a soft tone as his dog went and greeted him. “What happened?”

He looked your way and winced. “Y/N, you should be in bed, sweetheart.”

“I couldn’t sleep with you gone,” you replied as you walked towards him and looked him over. “Are you hurt anywhere else?”

“Just some sore ribs,” he said and waved it off. “Nothing I haven’t dealt with before.”

“John, I think we should go to the hospital-”

“No, no hospitals,” he said quickly and shook his head. “You know that. I’ll be fine. I just have to clean myself up.”

You sighed, but didn’t argue with him. You knew it would be a lost cause. You went over to him and made him put his arm around your shoulders as you gently put your arm around him. “Fine, but you’re going to let me take care of you at least.”

You started helping him up the stairs with his dog right behind you both. It took some time, but you managed to help him up the stairs and to the bedroom you shared. His dog ran for the bed and hopped right up on it, making himself comfortable as you lead John to the bathroom. He leaned back against the counter as you grabbed all the supplies you would need.

“I can do this myself, sweetheart,” he said, but you shushed him.

“Shut up and let me take care of you,” you replied with a bit of sass.

“Yes, ma’am,” he said and chuckled.

You began cleaning him up and applying antiseptic where it was needed. He barely flinched as you did all of this. His pain tolerance was pretty high, which made you feel bad. How many times had John been hurt to be so used to pain?

When you finished with his face, you worked on his knuckles. They were skinned up and bruising as well. You were as gentle as you could be with him. He took off his shirt and you hissed at the way his ribs on his right side were already starting to bruise.

“It looks worse than it feels,” he said, noticing the look on your face as you stared at the bruising. “I promise.”

“Doesn’t make it any better, John,” you told him. You could see from his reflection in the mirror that his back was also bruised up. “I guess we’ll just have to wrap them up and ice them. You could use a shower first though. Think you can handle it?”

“As long as you join me.”

“I don’t know if that’s a good idea,” you started to tell him. “You’re-”

“Baby, please,” he whispered as he laid a hand on your cheek, making you look up at him. “I just really need you close to me right now.”

You thought about it for a moment before you sighed. “Alright, but no funny business, mister. You’re banged up, which means I’m not banging you.”

“That’s cruel,” he groaned out. “Fine, I’ll take what I can get.”

“Good…now I’ll help you out of the rest of your clothes then I’ll clean this mess up. I’ll join you when I’m done.”

You helped him out of the rest of his clothes carefully before he walked over to the shower and turned the water on. You started cleaning up the mess you’d made from helping him and putting everything back where it went. By the time you’d finished, John was already in the shower and letting the warm water soothe his aching muscles. His back was facing you as steam was coming from the water and encircling him. You couldn’t help but admire him even if he was banged up. He was still absolutely beautiful and looked like he deserved to be on display in an art museum. His back muscles were proudly on display as he washed his hair, showcasing his tattoos clearly.

“Are you just going to stand there and enjoy the show or are you going to join me, Y/N?” He asked, breaking you from your thoughts as he looked back at you with a little smirk.

You blushed just a bit from being caught before you started removing your own clothes, which was one of John’s shirts and a pair of sleep shorts. Once you were completely naked, you stepped into the shower behind him. He turned to face you and pulled you to him so that you were under the spray with him. Water fell on you both as John leaned down and kissed you. You kissed him back as one of his hands came up to cup your cheek. It lasted for a few long moments before you finally pulled away.

“John, I told you no funny business,” you playfully scolded him with a look. “This is supposed to be a shower only.”

“I couldn’t help myself, sweetheart,” he replied as he looked down at you. His dark eyes seemed to be captivating you.

You hummed before you kissed his lips again. When you pulled away, you smiled at him before you looked down. His bruised ribs caught your eye and made you frown. You gently and very carefully ran your fingers over the injured area.

“I hate seeing you hurt, John,” you spoke softly over the sound of the water. “This is the worst it’s been, but this isn’t the first time you’ve came in hurt. I know you can take care of yourself. I just worry about you so much.”

John placed his finger under your chin and lifted your head so that you were looking at him again. He placed a sweet kiss on your forehead. “This was my last job. I’m out for good this time.”

Your eyes widened a bit in surprise as he spoke those words. He was out? For real this time?

“You’re out?” You asked just to be clear and he nodded. “No more jobs whatsoever?”

“No more jobs,” he said and smiled a little. “I did what I had to do in order to leave. My debts and favors are paid. I’m all yours now, sweetheart. I’m officially retired.”

You smiled real big and almost jumped into his arms, but you remembered his injuries. Instead you gave him a kiss full of love and passion, radiating your excitement for his news through it. He kissed you back with just as much love. He seemed excited to finally be out too.

“I love you, John,” you whispered when you finally pulled apart.

“I love you too, Y/N,” he replied as he rested his forehead against yours.

You finished up in the shower, washing John with care and sharing kisses in between. You’d have to show him just how happy you were when he was healed up more.

You started helping him up the stairs with his dog right behind you both. It took some time, but you managed to help him up the stairs and to the bedroom you shared. His dog ran for the bed and hopped right up on it, making himself comfortable as you lead John to the bathroom. He leaned back against the counter as you grabbed all the supplies you would need.

“I can do this myself, sweetheart,” he said, but you shushed him.

“Shut up and let me take care of you,” you replied with a bit of sass.

“Yes, ma’am,” he said and chuckled.

You began cleaning him up and applying antiseptic where it was needed. He barely flinched as you did all of this. His pain tolerance was pretty high, which made you feel bad. How many times had John been hurt to be so used to pain?

When you finished with his face, you worked on his knuckles. They were skinned up and bruising as well. You were as gentle as you could be with him. He took off his shirt and you hissed at the way his ribs on his right side were already starting to bruise.

“It looks worse than it feels,” he said, noticing the look on your face as you stared at the bruising. “I promise.”

“Doesn’t make it any better, John,” you told him. You could see from his reflection in the mirror that his back was also bruised up. “I guess we’ll just have to wrap them up and ice them. You could use a shower first though. Think you can handle it?”

“As long as you join me.”

“I don’t know if that’s a good idea,” you started to tell him. “You’re-”

“Baby, please,” he whispered as he laid a hand on your cheek, making you look up at him. “I just really need you close to me right now.”

You thought about it for a moment before you sighed. “Alright, but no funny business, mister. You’re banged up, which means I’m not banging you.”

“That’s cruel,” he groaned out. “Fine, I’ll take what I can get.”

“Good…now I’ll help you out of the rest of your clothes then I’ll clean this mess up. I’ll join you when I’m done.”

You helped him out of the rest of his clothes carefully before he walked over to the shower and turned the water on. You started cleaning up the mess you’d made from helping him and putting everything back where it went. By the time you’d finished, John was already in the shower and letting the warm water soothe his aching muscles. His back was facing you as steam was coming from the water and encircling him. You couldn’t help but admire him even if he was banged up. He was still absolutely beautiful and looked like he deserved to be on display in an art museum. His back muscles were proudly on display as he washed his hair, showcasing his tattoos clearly.

“Are you just going to stand there and enjoy the show or are you going to join me, Y/N?” He asked, breaking you from your thoughts as he looked back at you with a little smirk.

You blushed just a bit from being caught before you started removing your own clothes, which was one of John’s shirts and a pair of sleep shorts. Once you were completely naked, you stepped into the shower behind him. He turned to face you and pulled you to him so that you were under the spray with him. Water fell on you both as John leaned down and kissed you. You kissed him back as one of his hands came up to cup your cheek. It lasted for a few long moments before you finally pulled away.

“John, I told you no funny business,” you playfully scolded him with a look. “This is supposed to be a shower only.”

“I couldn’t help myself, sweetheart,” he replied as he looked down at you. His dark eyes seemed to be captivating you.

You hummed before you kissed his lips again. When you pulled away, you smiled at him before you looked down. His bruised ribs caught your eye and made you frown. You gently and very carefully ran your fingers over the injured area.

“I hate seeing you hurt, John,” you spoke softly over the sound of the water. “This is the worst it’s been, but this isn’t the first time you’ve came in hurt. I know you can take care of yourself. I just worry about you so much.”

John placed his finger under your chin and lifted your head so that you were looking at him again. He placed a sweet kiss on your forehead. “This was my last job. I’m out for good this time.”

Your eyes widened a bit in surprise as he spoke those words. He was out? For real this time?

“You’re out?” You asked just to be clear and he nodded. “No more jobs whatsoever?”

“No more jobs,” he said and smiled a little. “I did what I had to do in order to leave. My debts and favors are paid. I’m all yours now, sweetheart. I’m officially retired.”

You smiled real big and almost jumped into his arms, but you remembered his injuries. Instead you gave him a kiss full of love and passion, radiating your excitement for his news through it. He kissed you back with just as much love. He seemed excited to finally be out too.

“I love you, John,” you whispered when you finally pulled apart.

“I love you too, Y/N,” he replied as he rested his forehead against yours.

You finished up in the shower, washing John with care and sharing kisses in between. You’d have to show him just how happy you were when he was healed up more.
trail.content:
Retired (John Wick Imagine)

Summary: John is ready to officially leave the business.

You were sat on the couch with John’s dog laid out at the end of your feet. You were reading a book, but you could barely keep your attention on it. John had left hours ago on a job that he was called in for, which would be okay if your boyfriend’s job wasn’t so dangerous.

John was a hitman. The best hitman actually. He was known to everyone in his business as the Baba Yaga, the boogeyman.

You didn’t know all of this until you had been dating for about six months. He came clean with you because he thought you deserved that. He could tell that you two were getting serious and he wanted to lay it all out for you before you continued on. He expected you to leave him, but was surprised when you didn’t. You were freaked out of course. How could this man with a gentle heart be in a profession that’s so violent? You had fallen hard for John, however, so you didn’t let his job occupation deter you. He’d promised you that he was going to get out soon because he was ready to lead a normal life with you.

A year eventually went by and John asked you to move in with him, which you did. Everything was great. You and John were so domestic, but John still wasn’t out of the game fully. He told you he was trying to get out, but he had a few more business deals to take care of. You didn’t ask much about it. It was an unspoken rule that you didn’t ask questions and he wouldn’t tell you about it.

You finally put the book down and rubbed your eyes after reading the same sentence several times. You couldn’t concentrate when John was out there doing who knew what. You didn’t know if he was safe or anything. You just had to wait.

Finally, you heard the front door open. John’s dog, who yet had a name, raised up from his spot and immediately went running to the door. You stood and followed him, gasping at what you found. John was stood there in his well tailored suit, but he was looking worse for wear. Blood stained the white dress shirt he was wearing along with various spots of his suit jacket. His face also had some blood on it and you could see some spots already swelling. His hair was disheveled and he was bent over the staircase. You’d never seen him so beat up before.

“John,” you spoke in a soft tone as his dog went and greeted him. “What happened?”

He looked your way and winced. “Y/N, you should be in bed, sweetheart.”

“I couldn’t sleep with you gone,” you replied as you walked towards him and looked him over. “Are you hurt anywhere else?”

“Just some sore ribs,” he said and waved it off. “Nothing I haven’t dealt with before.”

“John, I think we should go to the hospital-”

“No, no hospitals,” he said quickly and shook his head. “You know that. I’ll be fine. I just have to clean myself up.”

You sighed, but didn’t argue with him. You knew it would be a lost cause. You went over to him and made him put his arm around your shoulders as you gently put your arm around him. “Fine, but you’re going to let me take care of you at least.”

You started helping him up the stairs with his dog right behind you both. It took some time, but you managed to help him up the stairs and to the bedroom you shared. His dog ran for the bed and hopped right up on it, making himself comfortable as you lead John to the bathroom. He leaned back against the counter as you grabbed all the supplies you would need.

“I can do this myself, sweetheart,” he said, but you shushed him.

“Shut up and let me take care of you,” you replied with a bit of sass.

“Yes, ma’am,” he said and chuckled.

You began cleaning him up and applying antiseptic where it was needed. He barely flinched as you did all of this. His pain tolerance was pretty high, which made you feel bad. How many times had John been hurt to be so used to pain?

When you finished with his face, you worked on his knuckles. They were skinned up and bruising as well. You were as gentle as you could be with him. He took off his shirt and you hissed at the way his ribs on his right side were already starting to bruise.

“It looks worse than it feels,” he said, noticing the look on your face as you stared at the bruising. “I promise.”

“Doesn’t make it any better, John,” you told him. You could see from his reflection in the mirror that his back was also bruised up. “I guess we’ll just have to wrap them up and ice them. You could use a shower first though. Think you can handle it?”

“As long as you join me.”

“I don’t know if that’s a good idea,” you started to tell him. “You’re-”

“Baby, please,” he whispered as he laid a hand on your cheek, making you look up at him. “I just really need you close to me right now.”

You thought about it for a moment before you sighed. “Alright, but no funny business, mister. You’re banged up, which means I’m not banging you.”

“That’s cruel,” he groaned out. “Fine, I’ll take what I can get.”

“Good…now I’ll help you out of the rest of your clothes then I’ll clean this mess up. I’ll join you when I’m done.”

You helped him out of the rest of his clothes carefully before he walked over to the shower and turned the water on. You started cleaning up the mess you’d made from helping him and putting everything back where it went. By the time you’d finished, John was already in the shower and letting the warm water soothe his aching muscles. His back was facing you as steam was coming from the water and encircling him. You couldn’t help but admire him even if he was banged up. He was still absolutely beautiful and looked like he deserved to be on display in an art museum. His back muscles were proudly on display as he washed his hair, showcasing his tattoos clearly.

“Are you just going to stand there and enjoy the show or are you going to join me, Y/N?” He asked, breaking you from your thoughts as he looked back at you with a little smirk.

You blushed just a bit from being caught before you started removing your own clothes, which was one of John’s shirts and a pair of sleep shorts. Once you were completely naked, you stepped into the shower behind him. He turned to face you and pulled you to him so that you were under the spray with him. Water fell on you both as John leaned down and kissed you. You kissed him back as one of his hands came up to cup your cheek. It lasted for a few long moments before you finally pulled away.

“John, I told you no funny business,” you playfully scolded him with a look. “This is supposed to be a shower only.”

“I couldn’t help myself, sweetheart,” he replied as he looked down at you. His dark eyes seemed to be captivating you.

You hummed before you kissed his lips again. When you pulled away, you smiled at him before you looked down. His bruised ribs caught your eye and made you frown. You gently and very carefully ran your fingers over the injured area.

“I hate seeing you hurt, John,” you spoke softly over the sound of the water. “This is the worst it’s been, but this isn’t the first time you’ve came in hurt. I know you can take care of yourself. I just worry about you so much.”

John placed his finger under your chin and lifted your head so that you were looking at him again. He placed a sweet kiss on your forehead. “This was my last job. I’m out for good this time.”

Your eyes widened a bit in surprise as he spoke those words. He was out? For real this time?

“You’re out?” You asked just to be clear and he nodded. “No more jobs whatsoever?”

“No more jobs,” he said and smiled a little. “I did what I had to do in order to leave. My debts and favors are paid. I’m all yours now, sweetheart. I’m officially retired.”

You smiled real big and almost jumped into his arms, but you remembered his injuries. Instead you gave him a kiss full of love and passion, radiating your excitement for his news through it. He kissed you back with just as much love. He seemed excited to finally be out too.

“I love you, John,” you whispered when you finally pulled apart.

“I love you too, Y/N,” he replied as he rested his forehead against yours.

You finished up in the shower, washing John with care and sharing kisses in between. You’d have to show him just how happy you were when he was healed up more.
